roleset.name: sending data in real time over the internet
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT-5, stream-v.03.

example.name: args 0, 1, MNR
example.text: Megaupload pretty much hosted most of my online tv streaming .
example.note: The roles can be ambiguous. Do your best to determine what is being streamed, and to/from where, based on the context of the particular instance.
